NECKAr_main module¶

NECKAr_main.find_locations(output_collection, input_collection)[source]¶

Finds locations in Wikidata dump and stores them together with additional information in the output collection

Parameters:
  • output_collection –
  • input_collection –
Returns:

nothing, writes objects directly to MongoDB

  • input_collection –
Returns:

NECKAr_main.find_persons(output_collection, input_collection)[source]¶
